name: node-blockly
description: Blockly for Node.js and Browser as CommonJS module

scripts.build: npm run blockly:upgrade && npm run addCustom && npm run compileBlockly && npm run prepublish
scripts.blockly:upgrade: git submodule init && git submodule update --recursive --remote
scripts.prepublish: rm -rf lib && mkdir lib && gulp build
